title: Private Amazon API Gateway REST API to be invoked from an AWS Lambda function in a different AWS Region
description: This pattern creates a Private Amazon API Gateway REST API, along with an Interface VPC Endpoint in an AWS Region. Subsequently, it creates a VPC, a Lambda function, a Private Hosted Zone, and a VPC Peering Connection in a second AWS Region. Finally, the VPC Peering connection is created in the first AWS Region. This way, a client in an AWS Region can send requests to the Private API Gateway in a different AWS Region.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to invoke a Private Amazon API Gateway REST API from a different AWS Region.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
